title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not contain the Team entry.
EB: When opening the context menu, the Team entry should be present to allow synchronization of the .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the context menu on a .java file and another resource.
2. Verify that the Team entry is not displayed.
3. The Team entry should be present for synchronization.
